scripts.build: npx prisma generate && tsc && mkdir -p netlify/functions/@prisma/client netlify/functions/.prisma netlify/functions/prisma && cp -r dist/* netlify/functions && cp dist/routes/user.js netlify/functions/user.js && cp -r node_modules/@prisma/client/* netlify/functions/@prisma/client && cp -r node_modules/.prisma/* netlify/functions/.prisma && cp -r prisma/* netlify/functions/prisma
